import React from 'react' import ReactCardFlip from "react-card-flip"; import "../static/style.css" export default function FlipCard(props) {; let {movieObj,vote_average,genreid,handleRemoveFromWatchList,name,watchList,poster_path} = props;

Rating {movieObj.vote_average}

return (
handleRemoveFromWatchList(movieObj)} className=" flex justify-center items-center h-8 w-8 rounded-lg"> ❌

{movieObj.title}

{genreid}

{popularity}

{movieObj.vote_average}

) }
